data.event: Founded in 1925, the city grew rapidly in the 1950s and 1960s, and is now the twelfth largest city in Florida.
Founded in 1925, the city grew rapidly in the 1950s and 1960s, and is now the twelfth largest city in Florida.

event.title: bought up thousands of acres of land around 1920

data.event: Young bought up thousands of acres of land around 1920, and named his new town "Hollywood by the Sea" to distinguish it from his other real estate venture, "Hollywood in the Hills", in New York.

event.title: 1926 Miami hurricane, Hollywood was severely damaged

data.event: After the 1926 Miami hurricane, Hollywood was severely damaged; local newspapers reported that Hollywood was second only to Miami in losses from the storm.
On Hollywood Boulevard is the Mediterranean-style Joseph Young Mansion, built around 1921, making it one of the oldest houses in Hollywood.
